thought: To solve this task I need to craft 6 sandstone walls, which requires 6 sandstones, which in turn requires 12 sand blocks. Therefore, I will start by moving one of the sand blocks from slot 14 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 1 with quantity 1
